title: Factory-ts improvements
description: Various improvements to add to the project and the factory-ts package

features.title: Agents require a search-files tool
features.description:
The agent calls the tool with a list of keywords, the whole project file system is searched and if any of them are found in a given file it will be returned in a final list.
The result is the list of relative file paths.

features.title: For standard agent suppliers - discover the latest prices
features.description: It must be possible to view the latest prices per model and refresh them via a configurable link to the given supplier's website.

features.title: factory-ts must be added as a project to this
features.description: A new task must be created for it - to be able to view and edit Agent personas.

features.title: Local database for file querying
features.description:
We need a local sql database so that we can store all the files for this project in there - their paths, tokenized content and also their content embeddings.
The paths, tokenized content and embeddings must be used for the search-files tool.

features.title: Watch file changes and keep the SQL database up to date
features.description: Whenever a file changes, we can directly update the database with everything but the embeddings - for that we need a system to queue up all files that require embeddings - and a user in the app can then launch an agent to trigger them.
